org.apache.lenya.cms.metadata
Class MetaDataImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.avalon.framework.logger.AbstractLogEnabled
      org.apache.lenya.cms.metadata.MetaDataImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.avalon.framework.logger.LogEnabled, MetaData
Direct Known Subclasses:
CustomMetaData, DublinCoreImpl, LenyaMetaData
public abstract class MetaDataImpl
extends org.apache.avalon.framework.logger.AbstractLogEnabled
implements MetaData

Generic meta-data implementation. Meta-data is represented as XML. For compatibility with the Dublin Core meta-data requirements, a set of meta-data may contain up to two namespaces, one for "elements" and one for "terms". A metadata implementation requiring only one namespace can ignore the "terms".

Version:
$Id: MetaDataImpl.java 365905 2006-01-04 13:21:44Z thorsten $

Returns:
an array of strings, containing the names of the namespaces

The prefixes under which this meta-data is specified.

getElements

protected abstract java.lang.String[] getElements()
Elements to be used in this meta-data. A meta-data implementation which does not have a fixed list of elements may return an empty array, and override useFixedElements()

Returns:
an array of string representing the elements
See Also:
useFixedElements()

getTerms

protected abstract java.lang.String[] getTerms()
Terms to be used in this meta-data. A meta-data implementation requiring only one namespace may ignore terms and return an empty array.

Returns:
an array of string representing the terms

useFixedElements

protected boolean useFixedElements()
Determine if the meta-data should consist of a fixed list of known attributes, or whether arbitrary names can be used.

Returns:
true if meta-data consists of fixed elements
